sentence: Not to mention a spectacular beachhowever it is a good thing that it is a self contained resort because when you move off the Mariot campus Marco Island itself is substantially different
My only two complaints with this property is that you have to go through the convention and meeting area to get to the spa
We ended up parking all the way at the north lot and entering the building by the conference rooms which was easier if staying in the Palms tower
We could not have picked a better place to hold our event and reconect after many years
You can also find somewhat less expensive dinner options off campus

Only reasons I did not give it an excellent rating little to no bag assistance upon arrival in our rental car room was nt cleaned very well the first few days dirty glasses left out elevators are too few for the amount of guests and their is temporary tents and generators on the beach during construction
Evening prior to the big event at Ario and golf outings spa visits one guest fell on unlighted steps and walkway near the pool which necessitated a trip to the ER for CT scan and X Rays
I was a little disappointed with the large tents on the beach
They had evening events in the ballroom which were noisy and the people attending and leaving would congregate right near our door and chat
My only complaint would be that they have recently put up a huge oppressive tent right in front of the view at Quin ’s their beachside restaurant
The inside is huge with a coffee shop two or three little shops and three restaurants plus the conference space and spa
We used their event coordinator and with her recommendations hired a day of coordinator florists DJ photographers etc
I was here for a work conference and extended my stay for my family to join me over the weekend
My husband and I stayed in an ocean view room at the Marco Island JW Mariot during an engineering conference in early August
The hotel is nice and the new conference space is well thought out
The JW Mariot Marco Island is a large 70 rooms convention and family vacation hotel on a beautiful beach
My husband and I were here for a conference and it was first class all aroundThe employees were professional and pleasant
Came here for business meetings and I am really pleasantly surprised by this resort
Great job on having additional indoor kids activities ie free movies and popcorn for families set up in your conference rooms
They easily handled a large group of educators for SAMs Conference
